sentence.Network_en: I lacked the stamina to run the whole length of the race.
sentence.Network_cn: 我没有跑完全程的精力.

sentence.Network_en: Giving up smoking had a magical effect on his stamina.
sentence.Network_cn: 戒烟神奇地增强了他的体力.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent. (in the sense 'rudiments, essential elements of something'): from Latin, plural of stamen in the sense 'threads spun by the Fates'

entry.def: Stamina is the physical or mental energy needed to do a tiring activity for a long time.

example.ex: You have to have a lot of stamina to be a top-class dancer.
example.tran: 你必须有很强的毅力才能成为一流的舞蹈演员。

auth_sentence.content: He lacked the stamina for trying again and again.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: He lacked the stamina for trying again and again.

auth_sentence.content: This exercise improves stamina and lowers blood pressure.

auth_sentence.res_content: For mental and physical stamina, try glutamine.

stems_affixes.word_buile: stagn=stan站,立+ant……的→站着不走,停滞的
stand确立+ard→n. 标准, 规格 adj.标准的
stead=stand[v.站, 立, 站起]+fast→稳固的
dis分开+stance=stan站,立→分开站着→有距离→距离
equi平等+distance[n.距离, 远离]→n.等距离
home家+stead=stand[v.站, 立, 站起]→站再家里的→处在家的→家园,家宅
in内+stan站,立+ce→站在里面的东西,表示就在面前→例子
stand确立+ard→n. 标准, 规格 adj.标准的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 站立, 身分, 名望, 持续
stems_affixes.word_buile: stand[v.站, 立, 站起]+ing状态→n.站立, 身分, 名望, 持续
stand[v.站, 立, 站起]+point点→n.立场, 观点

stems_affixes.value_cn: 物质;实质,本质;主旨;财产,资产
stems_affixes.word_buile: sub下面+stance=stan站,立→放在下面之物
stan站,立+d→v.站, 立, 站起

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使符合标准, 使标准化
stems_affixes.word_buile: standard[n. 标准, 规格 adj.标准的]+ize表动词→v.使符合标准, 使标准化

sentences.en: Giving up smoking had a magical effect on his stamina.
sentences.cn: 戒烟神奇地增强了他的体力。

sentences.en: Aerobic exercise helps to build up stamina.
sentences.cn: 有氧健身操有助于增强耐力。

sentences.en: Final exams at university can be as much a test of stamina as of knowledge.
sentences.cn: 大学里的期末考试既考知识也考耐力。

sentences.en: Emma Walton had to call on all her reserves of stamina to win the 10 000 metres.
sentences.cn: 埃玛·沃尔顿不得不动用她所贮备的全部耐力来赢得一万米赛跑。
